May 21, 2017 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Hymn Tune: 1. City of Bradford - 84 2. Stannington Brass - 82 3. Hade Edge - 81 4. Meltham & Meltham Mills - 80
Outstanding Euphonium: Hade Edge Outstanding Bass Section: Hade Edge Outstanding Soloist: Joel Kirk, Flugelhorn, Hade Edge Outstanding Conductor: Lee Skipsey, City of Bradford
Feb. 1, 2017, 1:55 p.m. May 28, 2017, 7:17 a.m.
1 Hade Edge Jonathan Beatty Of Distant Memories
2 Stannington Band Derek Renshaw
3 City of Bradford Brass Band Lee Skipsey
4 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Tim Sidwell Journey into Freedom
